Title: Dark Riders
Legend: For those marked by the Dark Riders, there is nowhere to flee. These cloaked killers gallop forth upon red-eyed shadowmares, levelling spears and repeater crossbows to deal a fatal blow to their quarry
Intro: Each model in a Dark Riders unit is armed with a Repeater Crossbow and Barbed Spear.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Dark Steeds are each armed with a Vicious Bite.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Herald. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Barbed Spear.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Shadow Raiders
Rules.Fluff: These warriors strike forth from unknown quarters in a succession of lightning-fast raids.
Rules.Rule: This unit can retreat and still shoot and or charge later in the turn. In addition, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit if it made a retreat move in the same turn.

Rules.Name: Sow Terror And Confusion
Rules.Fluff: Dark Riders wage a war of terror and confusion, striking at their enemy’s weakest points with merciless precision.
Rules.Rule: Sow Terror and Confusion: Roll a dice each time an enemy unit issues a command within 12" of any friendly units with this ability. On a 5+, that command is not received (it still counts as having been used) and the command point that was spent to issue that command is lost.
